job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: hello software engineerltbrgtltbrgtfreeosk is looking for a software engineer to join our technology team this position will own the process of automating functional testing of our skills and a testing oriented mindsetltbrgtltbrgtour hq is in chicago but you can be located within the continental united states there will be travel required to our chicago office from time to issues related to the kiosk applicationltligtltligtreview kiosk application pull requests and provide feedbackltligtltligtcontribute to the forward vision of the kiosk appltligtltulgtyour skills
